EntryName	NJMU_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein Njmu-R1
GeneName	C17orf75
Length	396
Function	As component of the WDR11 complex acts together with TBC1D23 to facilitate the golgin-mediated capture of vesicles generated using AP-1 (PubMed:29426865). May have a role in spermatogenesis.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network; Cytoplasmic vesicle
